thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
On the Offense
President Trump and his national-security team began laying the groundwork for a possible military strike against Syrian President Bashar al-Assad in response to a suspected chemical-weapons attack that killed dozens of civilians. As at least one U.S. guided-missile destroyer moved toward the Syrian coast, Mr. Trump said a quick decision is likely.
